import React from "react"; import "../App.css"; import Nava from "./Navbar"; import {useState} from 'react' ; export default function Favourite({delta}) { const [pageFav, setPageFav] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { axios .get(`https://movie-app-57731-default-rtdb.firebaseio.com/Admin.json`) .then((res) => { var b = res.data; setPageFav(b); }); }, []); return (
Favourites Movies
{Object.keys(pageFav).map((el) => (



{pageFav[el].title}

8.5 | 1h 57min | Animation, Action, Adventure

WATCH NOW
))}
); }
